name: Gebub's Adventure (itch)
description:
This game follows the travels of a small wandering creature named Gebub. Inspired by the 2003 adventure title Seiklus

Gebub's Adventure features a large peaceful world, filled with colorful orbs and many creatures who need your help. Explore your way through over 12 unique environments, collect hidden items and use them to help other creatures, who will in turn aid you in uncovering more of the mysterious world.

Experienced players could finish the game in about 1 hour, but a full exploration of the game world will take 2 hours or more.
